structure.unit: Chapter 33C FIXED-GUIDEWAY RAPID TRANSIT SYSTEM—DEVELOPMENT ZONE

text.section:
Sec. 33C-3. Rapid Transit Developmental Impact Committee.
There is hereby established a Rapid Transit Developmental Impact Committee Executive Council composed of the County's Developmental Impact Committee Executive Council (established by, Miami-Dade County Code) and two (2) representatives from each of the following municipalities: City of South Miami, City of Coral Gables, City of Miami, and the City of Hialeah. The Rapid Transit Developmental Impact Committee shall, subject to the procedures specified in, Miami-Dade County Code, perform the duties specified in and of this chapter.
Mailed notice of hearings before the Rapid Transit Developmental Impact Committee pursuant to(D)(9)(d) shall be provided in the same manner as hearings on applications filed before the Community Zoning Appeals Board pursuant to(d)(3) for the special exceptions expressly enumerated in that subsection. Mailed notice of the hearing shall also be provided simultaneously to the municipality in which the application site is located. Applications shall comply with the procedural requirements of.
